revised_title: Improving Electron Capture Calculations in High-Energy Collisions
tldr: The author proposes a new method for calculating the cross-section describing electron capture in high-energy collisions between atomic systems, improving upon previous methods that were not uniquely determined and had issues with interaction potentials. The new method involves both the impact parameter and wave treatments, taking into account momentum transfer in each. This approach offers a more accurate representation of electron capture in fast collisions.
